alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 9:28AM MST until March 03 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 8 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches near Lookout Pass, with lower elevation accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Wind gusts to 40 mph on Friday resulting in blowing snow and reduced visibility at times. * WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 8 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
